bibl.title: Cryptography at the Monastery of Deir el-Bachit.
bibl.note: O. Bachit Inv. 21 [descr.: Günther BURKARD, Michael MACKENZEN und Daniel POLZ, Die spätantike / koptische Klosteranlage Deir el-Bachit in Dra' Abu el-Naga (Öberägypten): Erster Vorbericht. Avec résumé en anglais, MDIK 59 (2003) pp. 63-64 et pl. 13]. Ostracon unearthed during the 2002 excavation season at the Deir el-Bachit monastery at Dra Abu el-Naga on the Luxor West Bank. Five alphabet exercises in Greek and Coptic letters; the first exercise is a cryptographic alphabet.
